answers.answer: Its really hard not to tell you to seek medical attention because what youre describing needs to be evaluated by a docter. Theres got to be some kind of backup for you to see a doctor in this type of situation.
Call a friend to take your 1 yr old or take them with you. The only real advice is to get medical attention asap.

Went to ER and got sent home like usual, that's another reason I never go to my hospital. They always dismiss me. Gave me Tylenol for everything and sent me home. It helped ease the pain but didn't help fully.

question: I know most of you guys are going to tell me to call doc or go to hospital right away, but it's not easy to go to hospital with a 1 year old, and boyfriend working all the time... I'm having severe headaches that I've had since 8am last night and it's a dull feeling along with feeling really tired and weak... I'm getting major heat flashes and chest tightness, (i have a blood condition which causes me to clot in my lungs, and gestational diabetes... I'm just nervous because Im having so many problems with this pregnancy and I'm so high risk, I don't want to end up having him too early. :( this is my second pregnancy and I am 20 both boys.  I'm 33 week +1 day today. What do you think?
title: pre eclamsia
